subject: UNACCEPTABLE - Double charged AGAIN!!!
body: THIS IS THE THIRD TIME I'VE BEEN DOUBLE CHARGED! I am FURIOUS. I want a full refund AND compensation for the time I've wasted dealing with this. If this isn't resolved TODAY I'm canceling my account and contacting the BBB. This is absolutely UNACCEPTABLE!!!

body: I was charged $299 instead of $199 on my last invoice. This is the second time this has happened. Please fix this immediately and refund the difference.

body: Page load times have gone from ~2s to over 15s in the last few days. Our team of 50 people can barely get any work done. This is severely impacting our productivity and we're considering alternatives if this isn't fixed soon.

body: Just wanted to say thank you to your support team for helping me resolve my issue last week. The response was fast and the solution worked perfectly. Keep up the great work!
